Lines.Description: Print 'Runtime Error: Bad teleporter' on quit
Yield on  timer to  next line
If 'camera_x' LessThan 'Player_X / XRes * XRes' ELSE GOTO 00001160
If 'camera_x' GreaterThan 'Player_X / XRes * XRes' ELSE GOTO 00001240
If 'camera_y' LessThan 'Player_y / yres * yres' ELSE GOTO 00001320
If 'camera_y' GreaterThan 'Player_y / yres * yres' ELSE GOTO 00001400
Print 'Error: Level needs to be at least as tall as the current Y Resolution value {yres}' on quit
Print 'AGA is required for this Scorpion Engine Game' on quit
Print 'Cannot change yres while level loaded' on quit
Print 'Y Resolution of 240 is not supported on NTSC Mega Drive' on quit
Print 'Y Resolution of {yres} is not supported on Mega Drive, only 224 (any) and 240 (pal)' on quit
Yield on  timer to  next line
